Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_qshwsg6g&referenceId=1_qshwsg6g&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: President Biden has hosted the first summit of North American leader in more than 5 years at the White House. Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and Mexican President Andrés Manuel López Obrador have met to discuss COVID19, migration, competitiveness and shared economic growth. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq reversed course to edge higher in volatile trading on Thursday after a clutch of upbeat retail and technology earnings encouraged investors to shrug off hawkish comments on inflation from a Federal Reserve policymaker. Starbucks have opened a new store which uses Amazon's cashierless technology to attract busy customers who need their coffee and snacks quickly. Amazon Go technology uses scales, cameras and shelf sensors to tally up customers totals and charge them when they leave the store.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/2Z0TrFX
